metadata.author: zsx
metadata.notes: Token-lean task demonstrating the raster erosion tool

tasks.task_text: Based on the Xinxiang City Rainstorm and Flooding Dataset, use the erosion operation to simulate an inward contraction of 1000 meters and review the generated outputs.
tasks.reference_solution_description: Retrieve the Xinxiang flood raster path and call the erode_raster_regions tool with a 1000-meter erosion distance so the contracted GeoTIFF, HTML preview, and summary statistics are recorded for review.

steps.comment: Confirm the on-disk path to the Xinxiang flood raster before running any processing tools.

arguments.preview_title: Xinxiang flood extent eroded inward by 1000 m

steps.comment: Apply the dedicated erosion tool to shrink the flooded zones by 1000 meters, saving a timestamped GeoTIFF plus the HTML preview for QA.
